content.prompt:
Listen to the excerpt.


Which of the following errors occurs between the soprano and bass voices in this excerpt?

choices.label: There is too much variety in motion.
There is no variety in motion.
There are more than three consecutive intervals of a third.
There are more than three consecutive intervals of a sixth.

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply harmonic, melodic, and rhythmic procedures of 18th-century voice leading (up to 4 voices) in performed music.
